task.summary: Default task
Added the .idea directory.
Made some minor changes to the knitro solver setup.
Changed the default initialization for the error rates.
Introduced a scaling factor for the objective function.
Switched to the active-set algorithm for solving the optimization problem.
Switched to using the active-set algorithm for solving the optimization problem.
Added some more data files.
Changed the getCombinations() method so that it uses arrays instead of lists.
Made the optimization problem implementation much faster.
Fixed some tests.
Created a data structure used by the error rates estimation code containing all of the important data.
Re-structured the code.
Documented code.
Added the Google Guava library.
Documented code.
Added some more data.
Made a few minor changes.
Added more documentation for the code.
Added support for multiple different types of objective functions to use for the numerical optimization problem.
Added documentation for the power set vectors related classes.
Documented the error rates estimation data structure.
Re-structured code and added some more unit tests.
Implemented a Newton's method solver and started using Apache Commons Math instead of COLT.
Re-structured the optimization package code.
Added initial step size selection methods.
Implemented an interpolation line search method based on the Armijo condition.
Fixed a small bug in the Armijo interpolation line search algorithm.
Made minor changes on how the code looks.
Implemented a line search algorithm that searches for a step size that satisfies the strong Wolfe conditions.
Added documentation and cleaned up code for the line search conditions checking methods.
Added documentation for part of line search package code.
Added documentation for the backtracking line search algorithm.
Added documentation for the step size initialization methods code.
Minor bug fix in the backtracking line search algorithm implementation.
Minor change in the way in which a quadratic function is defined.
Re-structured the optimization package code.
Implemented a conjugate gradient solver for quadratic functions.
Implemented the Fletcher-Reeves nonlinear conjugate gradient solver.
Minor changes, mainly regarding termination criteria.
Minor changes.
Re-structured the optimization package code to support implementations for more nonlinear conjugate gradient algorithms.
Made the solver interface and the relevant abstract classes package-private.
Implemented the Polak-Ribiere conjugate gradient solver.
Implemented the Polak-Ribiere+ nonlinear conjugate gradient algorithm.
Implemented the Hestenes-Stiefel nonlinear conjugate gradient optimization algorithm.
Made the termination criteria more customizable.
Changed the gradient norm convergence threshold for nonlinear conjugate gradient methods.
Added several tests and started using the Rosenbrock function as the benchmark function.
Significant re-structure of the optimization package code.
Made the main line search interface, the relevant abstract class and the class including the implementations of the step size initialization methods, package-private.
Minor changes.
Re-structured the nonlinear conjugate gradient solvers code.
Made the relevant nonlinear conjugate gradient changes to the test code as well and renamed the Newton's method solver to the Newton-Raphson solver.
Implemented the Fletcher-Rieves-Polak-Ribiere solver, the Dai-Yuan solver and the Hager-Zhang solver.
Minor change on the gradient convergence criterion.
Added documentation for the nonlinear conjugate gradient methods.
Minor changes.
Implemented a couple of restart methods for nonlinear conjugate gradient algorithms.
Renamed the Newton-Raphson solver to simply Newton solver.
Minor changes.
Minor change.
Implemented a quasi-Newton solver with a choice over several different Hessian approximation methods.
Improved the per-iteration printing for all optimization solvers.
Minor change on how the code looks.
Added a few more ways to initialize the inverse Hessian matrix (in commented code).
Minor bug fix.
Added documentation for the strong Wolfe interpolation line search algorithm.
Added documentation for the Armijo interpolation line search algorithm.
Minor change.
Fixed a bug and made some minor changes.
Implemented a draft version of a logistic regression classification algorithm and added some data to test it with.
Added some classification data.
Minor bug fix.
Implemented the limited memory Broyden-Fletcher-Goldfarb-Shanno (L-BFGS) quasi-Newton optimization algorithm.
Made some minor changes and added some override annotations.
Added some misssing override annotation tags in the line search package.
Minor bug fix.
Implemented the quasi-Newton Broyden solver.
Implemented several derivative approximation methods.
Implemented a method to approximate the product of the Hessian matrix of a function with some arbitrary vector.
Added some more tests for our derivative approximation methods.
Added some more tests for our derivative approximation methods.
Added support to automatically use derivatives approximation methods when the user does not supply implementations of the relevant methods.
Made some minor changes.
Added the ability to keep track of the number of function evaluations during an optimization procedure.
Implemented optimization termination criteria based on the number of iterations and the number of function evaluations.
Minor changes and bug fixes.
Replaced many of the overloaded constructors with setters for the relevant fields.
Replaced many of the line search classes overloaded constructors with setters for the relevant fields.
Fixed some minor bugs.
Implemented a coordinate ascent (derivative-free) solver.
Made some minor improvements in the documentation comments.
Implemented a couple more coordinate descent methods.
Made some structural changes and implemented some more unit tests.
Implemented a few methods for solving linear least squares problems and re-structured the optimization package.
Re-structured the optimization package.
Re-structured the optimization.function package to support a wide range of least squares functions.
Made some minor changes.
Added some @Override annotations.
Implemented the Gauss-Newton solver for solving nonlinear least squares problems.
Made some optimizations to the conjugate gradient solver.
Added some preconditioning methods for the conjugate gradient solver.
Bug fix related to setting the m parameter for the quasi-Newton solver.
Added the Hessian matrix calculation method in the logistic regression likelihood function and switched to using the quasi-Newton solver for training the logistic regression classifier.
Added some methods to handle non-positive definite matrices for the conjugate gradient solver.
Implemented a class for working with matrices.
Made some additions to the matrices code.
Added a class to support vector operations.
Minor changes.
Minor bug fix.
Made some minor changes and additions.
Implemented the Cholesky decomposition algorithm and also wrote some unit tests for it.
Minor change.
Minor changes.
Implemented the QR decomposition algorithm.
Minor changes.
Re-structured the Cholesky decomposition tests.
Implemented some tests for the QR decomposition algorithm.
Minor code presentation changes.
Implemented the LU decomposition algorithm and also wrote some unit tests for it.
Minor changes.
Minor changes.
Implemented the singular value decomposition algorithm and also wrote some unit tests for it.
Added more functionality to the matrix class.
Added some more minor functionality to the matrix and the vector classes.
Fixed a minor bug in the vector class.
Added support for generating diagonal matrices in the Matrix class.
Minor changes.
Implemented methods that get the maximum or the minimum value of a vector or a matrix.
Added some custom exceptions related to matrix operations and decompositions.
Made the conjugate gradient solver, the linear least squares solver and the Gauss-Newton solver more robust by adding some exception handling.
Removed an old TODO item.
Enforced noninstantiability in utilities classes containing only static methods.
Re-structured the conjugate gradient solver class using the builder pattern.
Changed the access level of the constructors of some abstract classes.
Made some minor changes.
Re-structured the quasi-Newton solver class using the builder pattern.
Made some minor changes.
Re-structured the coordinate descent solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured the Gauss-Newton solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured the gradient descent solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured the linear least squares solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured the Newton solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured the nonlinear conjugate gradient solver class using the builder pattern.
Re-structured solvers builders by using inheritance and generics.
Minor change.
Made some bug fixes.
Made the nonlinear conjugate gradient solver class extend the abstract line search solver class.
Made the code of some of the solver classes more consistent.
Minor bug fix and minor changes.

Major bug fix for the nonlinear conjugate gradient solver. Certain methods used the difference between the gradients of the function at the current and the previous points in a denominator. We did not have a check for whether or not that difference became equal to 0 at any point and thus we ended up with NaN values in certain cases.
Added support for setting the convergence criteria properties in the abstract iterative solver class through its builder class.
Made some bug fixes related to our solver builder classes.
Made a minor change to the conjugate gradient solver class.
Added some more functionality to the matrix package.
Added a method to compute the argmax for a given double array.
Minor change.
Minor change.
Added some documentation and made some minor changes.
Upgraded the logistic regression implementation so that it is able to handle multi-class classification problems instead of only binary classification problems.
Moved the DerivativesApproximationMethod enumeration inside the DerivativesApproximation class and made a few more minor changes.
Added a function to randomly sample elements from a list.
Made some minor changes.
Moved the StepSizeInitializationMethod enumeration inside the StepSizeInitialization class.
Minor change.
Implemented a stochastic gradient descent solver along with some relevant classes.
Made some minor (renaming) changes.
Added stochastic gradient as a solver option for the logistic regression classifier.
Numerical instability bug fix in the logistic regression predictions code.
Added some more flexibility on when to terminate stochastic iterative optimization algorithms.
Added support for more settings for the logistic regression classifier.
Re-structured the optimization package builder classes, so that the inherited builder methods can be invoked in any desirable order.
Added a couple more unit tests for the logistic regression classifier.
Major code re-structure related to how method enumerations are being used. switch statements were removed and the actual functionality of each method was moved within its corresponding enumeration.
Added support for sampling without replacement for stochastic algorithms.
Implemented the adaptive gradient stochastic optimization algorithm.
Started using Apache Maven.
Added support for the saxpy operation and refactored the vector classes.
Added support for the gaxpy operation and refactored the vector classes.
Improved the documentation for the vector classes.
Switched from @exception to @throws and improved the documentation for the vector classes.
Improved the vectors factory class.
Improved the exception handling for the vector classes.
Simplified the copy method of the dense vector class.
Fixed a bug where the provided array for the initialization of a dense vector was not copied and used at it is for the internal representation of the vector.
Added a sparse vector type implementation.
Fixed some bugs with the sparse vector class. Replaced intersection with union of key sets where needed.
Switched to using vector type instead of array for the initial point in the optimization library.
Minor bug fix for the adaptive gradient solver.
Minor bug fix for the adaptive gradient solver.
Made some minor changes.
Added a few implementations for the binary logistic regression model trained using a couple different algorithms.
Removed some redundant calculations from the binary logistic regression code.
Switched to using the Colt OpenIntDoubleHashMap instead of the Java HashMap for the internal data structure of the sparse vector implementation.
Made some minor changes to the code for "reading" classification training data from files.
Moved the testing data out of the repository.
Added support for using l2 regularization with the binary logistic regression models.
Renamed all the Utilities classes.
Fixed a bug, where changing the order of the multiplication of different sparse vectors element-wise would result in a different result.

Fixed the same bug as before (it had persisted), where changing the order of the multiplication of different sparse vectors element-wise would result in a different result. Also renamed the numberOfNonzeroElements() function of the Vector abstract class to cardinality().
Added support for L2 regularization in the stochastic solvers and for L1 regularization in the AdaGrad solver.
Added support for serializing vectors of all types (in a custom way).
Added support to write binary logistic regression model files to a file and to construct binary logistic regression prediction objects from files that contain trained models.
Minor bug fix.
Fixed a bug occurring when we sample without replacement for stochastic optimization algorithms.
Improved the performance of sparse vectors and of sampling for stochastic optimization methods.
Fixed a bug related to the AdaGrad update direction equation.
Added a new sparse vector implementation using two parallel arrays for internally storing the indexes and the values of the nonzero vector elements.
Made the AdaGrad algorithm faster.
Made the binary logistic regression implementations faster and did some refactoring.
Made the sparse vector implementation much faster.
Made some minor improvements for speed in the AdaGrad solver.
Made the data batches sampling for stochastic functions to optimize faster.
Made several improvements to the vector classes, mainly related to efficiency.
Minor division by zero bug fix.
Implemented part of the classifier integrator (part of the new self-reflection framework) and made some small changes to the structure of the classification library.
Added calls to close the input and the output streams used in the Integrator class.
Switched to using the Log4j 2 logging library for the optimization library.
Switched to using Log4j 2 for logging for the classification library.

Added support for storing feature maps in memory in the classification library and also added a storage interface so that other storage types can be implemented later on (for example, using a database).
Created a draft database design for trading-related data, using Hibernate.
Added date-time of creation and update columns to several tables of the trading database.
Intellij project and Maven file changes related to the previous two commits.
Switched to using a programmatic configuration for Hibernate in the trading library.
Fixed some bugs related to the trading library database.
Made several changes and somewhat refactored the perception library.
Improved the perception library and also added some more documentation for it.
Refactored the reflection library and added some constructors that allow for easier initialization of the error rates estimation procedure.
Switched to using the new generator mappings for the IDs in Hibernate.
Made several changes to the trading database schema.

MESSAGE.value: Improved the performance of sparse vectors and of sampling for stochastic optimization methods.
Fixed a bug related to the AdaGrad update direction equation.
Added a new sparse vector implementation using two parallel arrays for internally storing the indexes and the values of the nonzero vector elements.
Made the AdaGrad algorithm faster.
Made the binary logistic regression implementations faster and did some refactoring.
Made the sparse vector implementation much faster.
Made some minor improvements for speed in the AdaGrad solver.
Made the data batches sampling for stochastic functions to optimize faster.
Made several improvements to the vector classes, mainly related to efficiency.
Minor division by zero bug fix.
Implemented part of the classifier integrator (part of the new self-reflection framework) and made some small changes to the structure of the classification library.
Added calls to close the input and the output streams used in the Integrator class.
Switched to using the Log4j 2 logging library for the optimization library.
Switched to using Log4j 2 for logging for the classification library.

Added support for storing feature maps in memory in the classification library and also added a storage interface so that other storage types can be implemented later on (for example, using a database).
Created a draft database design for trading-related data, using Hibernate.
Added date-time of creation and update columns to several tables of the trading database.
Intellij project and Maven file changes related to the previous two commits.
Switched to using a programmatic configuration for Hibernate in the trading library.
Fixed some bugs related to the trading library database.
Made several changes and somewhat refactored the perception library.
Improved the perception library and also added some more documentation for it.
Refactored the reflection library and added some constructors that allow for easier initialization of the error rates estimation procedure.
Switched to using the new generator mappings for the IDs in Hibernate.
Made several changes to the trading database schema.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Made several changes to the trading database schema.
